item.title: Recap of week 02, 2016
item.description: Recap of week 02 of 2016, covering open source and sysadmin related news, articles, guides, talks, discussions and fun stuff.

item.title: Word occurrence counter and analyzer
item.description: With these commands you can analyze a text file. It will count all the occurrences of all words and put out the stats. It is usefull for song lyrics, books, notes and everything.

item.title: Correctly grep and display the uptime, load average and amount of users
